document.title: Technical Bulletins: Selected Short Bibliography on Energy Conservation by Local Governments
document.abstract: Selected Short Bibliography on Energy Conservation by Local Governments. Includes such titles as Handbook of Energy Policy for Local Governments, Energy Saving Check List for Industrial and Commercial Companies(complied by Knoxville Utilities Board based on survey of practices of board customers), and Energy Conservation in Buildings: New Roles for Cities and Citizen Groups (National League of Cities).

field.name: comments
field.value: The MTAS publications provided on this website are archival documents intended for informational purposes only and should not be considered as authoritative. The content contained in these publications may be outdated, and the laws referenced therein may have changed or may not be applicable to your city or circumstances. For current information, please visit the MTAS website at: http://mtas.tennessee.edu
